Use of CSF-APT-1 and CSF-APT-2, which are specific to CSF, may offer improvements in speed and accuracy compared to current CSF diagnostics.

Authors: Liu, Dong; Zhang, Yuan; Li, Jingyun; Zhang, Xu; Zhang, Luo et al.

Given improved survival with HPV-associated SNSCCs and emergence of novel surveillance methods, routine pathologic HPV testing of SNSCC should be considered.
